free","externalTicketingUrls":[],"multiEventCartable":true,"facebookEventId":186605298444894,"facebookEventIdString":"186605298444894","headliners":[{"id":437623,"name":"The Stolen Sweets","startTime":"2016-11-20 18:30:00","eventDescription":"The Stolen Sweets formed in 2005 with the intention of reviving the songs of 30s New Orleans sister act, The Boswell Sisters. The “Bozzies” were popular harmony singers in the late 20s and early 30s, keeping company with the Dorsey Brothers, Bunny Berigan, and Benny Goodman -- partnerships that provided the jazz world with some of its most influential recordings. The nature of the music was auspicious and good-humored, providing a ray of hope to listeners during a truly dispiriting economic depression. Unlike the original Boswell arrangements that featured horns, the Sweets incorporate gypsy jazz, reminiscent of Django Reinhardt. The Sweets owe a great debt of gratitude to the city of New Orleans, from which they draw much of their musical inspiration. On January 29, 2010, the Sweets became the 1st vocal jazz group ever to grace the stage at Preservation Hall, a legendary venue which is usually reserved for Dixieland and brass instrumental groups. In a career suffused with many bright lights and packed houses, this burns among the brightest for the Sweets.","isMobileFriendly":"false","image":{"jumbo":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atjmbo.jpg","width":960,"height":639},"jumbo1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atjmbo1.jpg","width":960,"height":540},"large":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atlg.jpg","width":300,"height":200},"large1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atlg1.jpg","width":300,"height":200},"medium":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atmd.jpg","width":200,"height":133},"medium1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atmd1.jpg","width":200,"height":133},"original":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-og.jpg","width":960,"height":639},"small":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atsm.jpg","width":100,"height":67},"small1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atsm1.jpg","width":100,"height":67},"square":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-sq.jpg","width":100,"height":100},"squareSmall":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-sqsm.jpg","width":60,"height":60},"xlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atxl.jpg","width":500,"height":333},"xlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atxl1.jpg","width":500,"height":333},"xxlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atxxl.jpg","width":650,"height":433},"xxlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/05-atxxl1.jpg","width":650,"height":433}},"youtubeVideos":[],"embedAudio":"

","embedVideo":"","urlAudio":"","urlPurchaseMusic":"","urlOfficialWebsite":"http://www.stolensweets.com","urlMySpace":"","urlFacebook":"https://www.facebook.com/stolensweets/","urlTwitter":"","twitterScreenName":""},{"id":1740103,"name":"Seth Bernard","startTime":"2016-11-20 17:30:00","eventDescription":"Seth was raised by northern Michigan's music scene. He's traversed the many worlds of music, collecting hints of jazz, blues, traditional folk, straight up rock and even old spirituals, carving a unique place for himself in the Americana music of today. His lyrics are compassionate, truthful, loving and hilarious, touching on everything from the beauty and irony of living on earth as humans, to the troubles of the world and the journeys we take through time and understanding. Seth is a community organizer, responsible for creating and building one of the biggest, most beloved music festivals in Michigan and the entire Great Lakes region, the Earthwork Harvest Gathering. His performances have taken him all over the globe, with notable appearances at The Wonder Ballroom in Portland, The Ark in Ann Arbor and on A Prairie Home Companion. He has shared stages with such luminaries as Greg Brown, Greensky Bluegrass, Josh Davis and many others. Seth is also the younger brother of stalwart Portland musician Jen Bernard (The Stolen Sweets). This year, Seth collaborated with the Sweets at the annual Hiawatha Music Festival in Michigan's Upper Peninsula. On November 20 at the Secret Society, audiences will have the unique treat of seeing Seth share a stage with with the Sweets! "Bernard's earnest delivery is appealing in its simplicity, allowing you to lose yourself in the poetry." -Performing Songwriter Magazine "As an editor of many books on music, a question I am often asked is: 'Are there any singer/songwriters on the way up out there, as good as the great communicators of the past, like perhaps a young Woody Guthrie?' Until now I never really had much of anyone to suggest. However, a young Michigan musician/entertainer/storyteller, Seth Bernard is more than just a minor talent. He is a singer, a songwriter, and also a true entertainer whose music and broad vision is not only felt by an audience, but will also in time, I predict, embrace more than a few other hardened so-called music critics and experts, like myself. Bernard is a rare bird, an authentic communicator with the right idea for these times. Give him a listen. By all means, see him in person." -Michael Erlewine, Founder of the All-Music Guide "Seth Bernard wields an acoustic guitar, a powerful stage presence and a fiercely contagious spirit... Thought-provoking, compassionate, funny songs backed up by agile picking." -The Ark, Ann Arbor "I know that the future of music is in good hands with people like Seth around to be its caretaker. More importantly, I know the future of our world is in good hands." -Greg Brown, Folk Legend "This music not only swings, rocks, and grooves--it matters. It's the voice of a real community, with a sound and a message the world needs to hear." -Bill McKibben, Author, environmentalist, journalist","isMobileFriendly":"false","image":{"jumbo":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atjmbo.jpg","width":960,"height":1200},"jumbo1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atjmbo1.jpg","width":960,"height":540},"large":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atlg.jpg","width":300,"height":375},"large1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atlg1.jpg","width":300,"height":200},"medium":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atmd.jpg","width":200,"height":250},"medium1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atmd1.jpg","width":200,"height":133},"original":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-og.jpg","width":1088,"height":1360},"small":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atsm.jpg","width":100,"height":125},"small1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atsm1.jpg","width":100,"height":67},"square":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-sq.jpg","width":100,"height":100},"squareSmall":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-sqsm.jpg","width":60,"height":60},"xlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atxl.jpg","width":500,"height":625},"xlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atxl1.jpg","width":500,"height":334},"xxlarge":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atxxl.jpg","width":650,"height":813},"xxlarge1":{"path":"http://cdn.ticketfly.com/i/00/02/32/66/01-atxxl1.jpg","width":650,"height":433}},"youtubeVideos":[],"embedAudio":"","embedVideo":"","urlAudio":"","urlPurchaseMusic":"","urlOfficialWebsite":"http://samuelsethbernard.com","urlMySpace":"","urlFacebook":"https://www.facebook.com/eggsbernard/?fref=ts","urlTwitter":"","twitterScreenName":""}],"supports":[],"urlEventDetailsUrl":"http://secretsociety.ticketfly.com/event/1344653?utm_medium=api"}]}
